Package com.illcode.meterman.event

The various listener and processor interfaces that can be registered with the GameManager.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DescriptionTextProcessor
    A DescriptionTextProcessor is notified when the text that will be displayed for a Room or Entity description (via a Look command or entity selection) has been gathered and is ready for display in the UI.
    EntityActionsProcessor
    An EntityActionsProcessor is notified when the list of entity actions to display is being generated.
    EntitySelectionListener
    A listener that will be notified when an entity is selected in the UI.
    GameActionListener
    A GameActionListener is notified before and after the player chooses an action.
    ParserMessageProcessor
    Normally the GameManager prints a parser-like message when an action is performed, like "> TAKE CLOAK".
    PlayerMovementListener
    A PlayerMovementListener is notified before and after the player moves rooms
    TurnListener
    A TurnListener is notified at the end of each turn

Package com.illcode.meterman.event Description

The various listener and processor interfaces that can be registered with the GameManager.
